Package org.apache.lucene.index

Class CheckIndex.Level

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.index.CheckIndex.Level
Enclosing class:
CheckIndex
public static class CheckIndex.Level extends Object
Class with static variables with information about CheckIndex's -level parameter.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    DEFAULT_VALUE
    The default level if none is specified.

    MAX_VALUE

    Minimum level required to run integrity checks.

    MIN_LEVEL_FOR_SLOW_CHECKS
    Minimum level required to run slow checks.

    Minimum valid level.
